mapper.sql: id, follow_up_id, form, data_item, patient_id, patient, `value`, skeptic, review, review_state, proposal_time, review_date, del_state
mapper.select:
select
from data_review
del_state = 0
and follow_up_id = #{record.followUpId}
and form = #{record.form}
and data_item like "%"#{record.dataItem}"%"
and patient_id = #{record.patientId}
and patient like "%"#{record.patient}"%"
and value like "%"#{record.value}"%"
and skeptic like "%"#{record.skeptic}"%"
and review like "%"#{record.review}"%"
and review_state in
#{item}
and review_date like "%"#{record.reviewDate}"%"
mapper.insert: insert into data_review (id, follow_up_id, form, data_item, patient_id, patient, `value`, skeptic, review, review_state, proposal_time, review_date, del_state) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{followUpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{form,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skeptic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{review,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proposalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reviewDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delState,jdbcType=INTEGER})
